metadata.title: USN-4507-1 -- ncmpc vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that ncmpc incorrectly handled long chat messages. A remote attacker could possibly exploit this with a crafted chat message, causing ncmpc to crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2018-9240)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4507-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  ncmpc - 0.24-1+deb8u1build0.16.04.1 ncmpc-lyrics - 0.24-1+deb8u1build0.16.04.1 No subscription required
